Room.Name: Entry
Room.Description: A large drawbridge gate leading to a courtyard

Room.Name: Courtyard
Room.Description: A large courtyard with destroyed battle equipment.

Room.Name: Tower Entry
Room.Description: A small stairway leading to a tall tower.

Room.Name: Tower Stairs
Room.Description: A long set of spiraling stairs leading to the top of the tower.

Room.Name: Tower Top
Room.Description: The top of the tower, with wood floorings and a sweeping view of the land around.

Room.Name: Armory
Room.Description: A large room filled with armors and ancient weaponry.

Room.Name: Castle Entrance
Room.Description: A large, double door entry way leading to a massive castle.

Room.Name: Guard Room
Room.Description: A small tower filled with bunk beds and tables.

Room.Name: Castle
Room.Description: A large castle, the interior is massive and filled with benches and tables, and a single red, long carpet.
